0521
Install Alphabet 1.0.0
Install Alphabet 2.0.0
Find the configuration where only Alphabet 1.0.0 shows up
1) it shows a status warning where is we restore, it would be ok
2) open the pop-up menu on Alphabet on configuration history
see Show Status
Select the Site in teh same configuration history
The menu now has show status and the icons are gone
